name: PDF Crochet Pattern - Pizza
description:
• PATTERN ONLY *
Pizza, anyone ??? Do you want to have a slice of the super thin crust Pizza with lots and lots of delicious toppings – pepperoni, green pepper, onion, pineapple, olive, fresh mushrooms, melted cheese and a good sprinkling of chilli flakes. One bite and you will be coming back for more :) The diameter of the whole pizza is 5.8 inches (14.7 cm). The pizza slice measures 3 inches (7.6 cm) longest.
This PATTERN is for those who already know basic crocheting skills like slip stitch, single crochet, half-double crochet, double crochet, working in rounds, working in rows,etc. For sale is one PATTERN in PDF format of Thin Crust Pizza (whole and slice). This pattern consists of 9 pages. It comes with many pictures detailing the different stages of crocheting. The acrylic yarn I used is 18 wraps per inch and hence is categorised under ‘fine’ yarn. Wraps per inch (or WPI) is a measure of the grist or the thickness of a yarn. Please google or search the internet for more information about WPI and yarn type. If you are interested in purchasing the PATTERN, you can pay via Paypal. I will send the pattern to your email address as soon as I receive your payment. Please feel free to contact me at amy_lim60@hotmail.com if you have any questions. I will be most happy to answer any questions through email should you encounter any problems during crocheting. PLEASE NOTE: Selling of the finished item is allowed. DO NOT redistribute, resell, and/or translate pattern into another language for reselling. There will be NO REFUND of money for all PDF Patterns purchased. Thank you!
